lexUnit.name: charge.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: Charge a person with a crime

sentence.text: We have also seen how in earlier times people involved in acts of gross disorder would commonly be charged only with simple assault or drunkenness … street violence was too much of an everyday occurrence to count as “ real ” crime .
